suite.name: Login Testing

test.name: Đăng ký thành công

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Alert Should Be Present
kw.msg: Alert message should have been 'Sign Up Success' but it was 'Error: {"message":"request failed","error":{"response":{"message":"Email was exitsed","error":"Bad Request","statusCode":400},"status":400,"options":{},"message":"Email was exitsed","name":"BadRequestException"}}'.
kw.doc: Verifies that an alert is present and by default, accepts it.
kw.status: Alert message should have been 'Sign Up Success' but it was 'Error: {"message":"request failed","error":{"response":{"message":"Email was exitsed","error":"Bad Request","statusCode":400},"status":400,"options":{},"message":"Email was exitsed","name":"BadRequestException"}}'.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: Kiểm thử đăng ký thành công
test.status: Alert message should have been 'Sign Up Success' but it was 'Error: {"message":"request failed","error":{"response":{"message":"Email was exitsed","error":"Bad Request","statusCode":400},"status":400,"options":{},"message":"Email was exitsed","name":"BadRequestException"}}'.
